Info

Defines class ATSError with attribute(s) and method(s). Creates an error message container for the console log mechanism.

class ats_utilities.console_io.error.ATSError[source]¶

Bases: object

Defines class ATSError with attribute(s) and method(s). Creates an error message container for the console log mechanism. Mechanism for logging error messages.

It defines:

attributes:
_message - Error message container.
methods:
__init__ - Initials ATSError constructor.
message - Property methods for set/get operations.
is_not_none - Checks is message not None.
is_not_none() → bool[source]¶

<bool>

Exceptions:

None

property message: str | None¶

Property method for getting message.

Returns:

Formatted errors message | None

Return type:

<Optional[str]>

Exceptions:

None

ats_utilities.console_io.error.error_message(message: List[Any]) → None[source]¶

Shows error message.

Parameters:

Exceptions:
